price: ߊߟߎ߯ ߦߟߌߡߊߘߌߦߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߏ ߣߊ߬ߕߐ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߋ߬، ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߓߟߏߡߓߊߟߌߓߊ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
